 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּ֫רַע‎</span>] **noun [feminine]** ==leg==, (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּרַע‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּרְעָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> — only dual feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרָעַיִם‎</span> [[Lev.11.21|Lev 11:21]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרָעָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Lev.9.14|Lev 9:14]] sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרָעָיו‎</span> [[Exod.12.9|Exod 12:9]] + 3 t.; — ***two*** (bending) ***legs***, of animals in ritual phrase of [[BDB#P|P]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשׁוֺ עַלכְּֿרָעָיו‎</span> [[Exod.12.9|Exod 12:9]] ***his head with his legs***, [[Lev.4.11|Lev 4:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(ה)קרב(ו) ו(ה)כרע (יוׅ‎</span> (***his***) ***inwards*** and (***his***) ***legs*** [[Exod.29.17|Exod 29:17]]; [[Lev.1.9|Lev 1:9]]; [[Lev.1.13|Lev 1:13]]; [[Lev.8.21|Lev 8:21]]; [[Lev.9.14|Lev 9:14]]; [[Amos.3.12|Amos 3:12]] (of legs of lamb in mouth of lion); of the long bending hinder legs of the Saltatorial Orthoptera (see [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>Nat. Hist. Bib. 309</sup>; [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Joel 84</sup>) [[Lev.11.21|Lev 11:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר לוֺ כְרָעַיִם מִמַּעַל לְרַגְלָיו לְנַתֵּר בָּהֵן עַל הָאָרֶץ‎</span> which have ***bending legs*** above their feet, etc.
